title: privacytoken
author: privacytoken
content: ¿What is Privacy?Privacy aims to be the first anonymous stable coin, backed 1:1 by US dollars.Privacy lets you buy USDA stable tokens with any major cryptocurrency, anonymously. In other words, when you buy a Privacy token, you send Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDC, USDT or DAI to a Privacy wallet and receive Privacy Tokens (USDA). We take care of exchanging to US dollars this transaction and backing up the tokens issuance.At any time, you can exchange your Privacy Tokens to Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, USDC, or DAI again at the current exchange rate. When you withdraw your position, these tokens are burned and the 1:1 backing on the issued tokens is maintained. Each transaction in Privacy has a 2.5% commission. 1% of the daily turnover is distributed among token holders. You can stake Privacy or withdraw liquidity at any time. Finally, Privacy doesn't host or maintain in its databases any personally identifiable information about token holders. Neither hosts IP logs, personal information or any purchases or sales. Privacy’s main functions: - Buy and sell tokens backed by 1:1 dollars anonymously. - ERC20 token on the Ethereum network.- Earns 1% equivalent of daily transactions.Official website:https://privacyusd.comContract https://etherscan.io/token/0x0044eb3a7cad31645798124db9a74400c9671627

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: your concept is good, nowadays there are so many fiat digital currency in circulation and it is very trusted by people all over the world, i support your project but what is so unique about Privacy project? you have to prove that the Privacy project can be trusted by people
